document.bingtitle: Patty's Burger Time | West Boise | Burgers & Drive-Ins | Restaurants
document.description: The only Idaho Preferred fast food restaurant uses ... Take-out, Patio, Online Menu. Price: $ ... horrible (They were happy to take my tip though!). The waitress was talking trash ...
